DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate incidence clinically significant hypocalcemia follow multiple 120 mg subcutaneous dos denosumab patient severe chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) CKD dialysis
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Study Evaluate Safety Multiple Doses Denosumab 120 mg Adults With Severe Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) CKD Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Subjects least 18 year old severe CKD ( define creatinine clearance < 30 mL/min screen assessment ) CKD require hemodialysis Additional inclusion criterion apply Subjects must calcium , phosphate , magnesium level appropriate condition must uncontrolled comorbidities . Additional exclusion criterion apply
